PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2015-08252015-06-17,  ,  ,  ,  ,  ,  NR,  CRA
ActCanada Pension Plan
SubjectRegulations Amending the Canada Pension Plan Regulations
PrecisRegulations Amending the CANADA PENSION PLAN REGULATIONS in order to (1) correct inconsistencies between the English and French versions of the Regulations; (2) ensure that the intent of Canada and foreign governments that employ individuals in Canada and whose employment is recognized under a Social Security Agreement (SSA)as being covered under the Canada Pension Plan is respected; and (3) update the Regulations to account for the termination of Minister of National Revenue agreements which have been terminated by SSAs.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2015-0158 Publication Date: 2015-07-01
AttachmentsAttachment
subject: Regulations Amending the Canada Pension Plan Regulations
precis: Regulations Amending the CANADA PENSION PLAN REGULATIONS in order to (1) correct inconsistencies between the English and French versions of the Regulations; (2) ensure that the intent of Canada and foreign governments that employ individuals in Canada and whose employment is recognized under a Social Security Agreement (SSA)as being covered under the Canada Pension Plan is respected; and (3) update the Regulations to account for the termination of Minister of National Revenue agreements which have been terminated by SSAs.
